attributes.additional_details:
We voted to take back control of our fishing waters our laws, control of our our borders and our money, their was no P.T.O on our ballet papers for a hard or soft brexit, 
David carmen told this nation it was our choice,  not parliament not politicians not lobby groups, so this country voted on  what David Cameron told us and that what should be upheld and delivered on,
attributes.background:
17,410,742 calls upon this government to deliver the referendum result 100%,
and stop all parliament politicans looby groups from trying to stop us leaving  or watering down what we voted for.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
